content: - click 'new message' - then, if menu bar is showing, click view>toolbars and tick composition toolbar. If menu bar is not showing, click the alk key.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hello there We have read the message We try to help

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/unified-toolbar

Your submit button has disappeared according to your writing, okay. We've had a new look for a while now and some buttons have been moved.

If you wanted to use your submit button and replace it as it is, you could drag it from a palette where all the buttons are located and I'll show you the way here.

I am also sending you a form containing this explanation for versions of Thunderbird software from the time Supernova was created.

Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: googlethunderbird

content:
Hello

Fix Font Scaling and Density Issue on Thunderbird 115 Upgrade https://blog.thunderbird.net/2023/11/font-scaling-and-density-issue-on-thunderbird-115-upgrade https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-115-supernova-faq#w_why-are-thunderbird-115s-fonts-so-large-so-small

How to restore the pre-Supernova display density ? Take a look https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/172d4ez/how_to_restore_the_presupernova_display_density https://forums.mozfr.org/viewtopic.php?t=152418
creator: Agentvirtuel

content:
Ciao, anzitutto due domande:

  1. l'account è di tipo IMAP o POP3?
  2. accedi allo stesso account anche da altre posizioni (webmail, app, smartphone, etc.)?

Intanto come misura di emergenza, fai una copia delle email che rischiano di essere cancellate: Tieni premuto il tasto Ctrl sulla tastiera e trascina i messaggi in una sottocartella di Cartelle locali (eventualmente creala appositamente)
creator: @next

content:
Ciao, 1. è un account IMAP 2. accedo allo stesso account da un secondo PC, sempre con Thunderbird, e lì le mail non spariscono

Grazie intanto per la misura d'emergenza
creator: desireedandrea
